(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Final))
    (VP (VBP call)
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP
          (NP (DT those))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP who))
            (S
              (VP (VBP are)
                (ADVP (RB still))
                (VP (VBG thinking)
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (S
                      (VP (VBG joining)
                        (NP (DT the) (NNP Alpha) (NN course))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(call-2, Final-1)
root(ROOT-0, call-2)
prep(call-2, for-3)
pobj(for-3, those-4)
nsubj(thinking-8, who-5)
aux(thinking-8, are-6)
advmod(thinking-8, still-7)
rcmod(those-4, thinking-8)
prep(thinking-8, of-9)
pcomp(of-9, joining-10)
det(course-13, the-11)
nn(course-13, Alpha-12)
dobj(joining-10, course-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB still))
      (RB not)
      (ADJP (RB too) (JJ late)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB sign)
              (PRT (RP up))
              (SBAR (IN as)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP we))
                  (ADVP (RB only))
                  (VP (VBD had)
                    (NP
                      (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ first) (NN session))
                      (NP (JJ last) (NN week)))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(late-6, It-1)
cop(late-6, is-2)
advmod(late-6, still-3)
neg(late-6, not-4)
advmod(late-6, too-5)
root(ROOT-0, late-6)
aux(sign-8, to-7)
xcomp(late-6, sign-8)
prt(sign-8, up-9)
mark(had-13, as-10)
nsubj(had-13, we-11)
advmod(had-13, only-12)
advcl(sign-8, had-13)
poss(session-16, our-14)
amod(session-16, first-15)
dobj(had-13, session-16)
amod(week-18, last-17)
dep(session-16, week-18)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Click)
      (ADVP (RB here))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB learn)
            (NP (JJR more))
            (PP (IN about)
              (NP (NNP Alpha)))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Click-1)
advmod(Click-1, here-2)
aux(learn-4, to-3)
xcomp(Click-1, learn-4)
dobj(learn-4, more-5)
prep(learn-4, about-6)
pobj(about-6, Alpha-7)


(ROOT
  (ADJP (JJ Hope)
    (S
      (VP (TO to)
        (VP (VB see)
          (NP (PRP you))
          (ADVP (RB soon)))))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Hope-1)
aux(see-3, to-2)
xcomp(Hope-1, see-3)
dobj(see-3, you-4)
advmod(see-3, soon-5)
